: keepalive

: ping

data: {"id":"chatcmpl-ka1","object":"chat.completion.chunk","created":1234,"model":"claude","choices":[{"index":0,"delta":{"content":"alive"},"finish_reason":null}]}

: another ping

: and another

: final ping

data: [DONE]
